items.name: I Love Writing Wiki
items.title: I Love Writing Wiki
items.headline: Welcome to the I Love Writing Wiki!
items.desc:
The I Love Writing wiki is all about writing of any kind that anyone can edit! Let your mind race and write about anything that you can come up with- from fantasy creatures, science fiction, murder mystery, and more. We encourage our users to have fun with it!

New users should feel free to come and contribute their thoughts and ideas on the wiki! They can also edit existing stories or add their own.
